name: ArtemideLightingControl
0:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom lamp”
”Alexa, turn on living room lamp”
”Alexa, turn on office lamp”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Thanks to this skill it is possible to turn on/off, adjust intensity, change color, color temperature and activate scenarios of Artemide lamps (decorative, architectural, indoor and outdoor).
The control applies to one or more lamps previously configured through Artemide App and it will be enough to state, in the voice command, the names by which they have been entered in your network.

Requirements
Using the skill in Alexa requires the installation of Artemide's new Edimetra Gateway.
Edimetra Gateway can be configured directly with Artemide App, in the "Alexa Configuration" section of the app you can associate your network with Alexa.
To use this skill, you need to log in initially with the same credentials used in Artemide App.
